General.Name: Q.S.I Co. LTD
General.Description: Q.S.I Co., LTD. develops, manufactures, and sells red and infra-red laser diodes in South Korea and internationally. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Cheonan-si, South Korea.

1.Name: Tae-Kyung  Kim
1.Title: Sr. Managing Director, Chief Technology Officer and Director
